employees.name: Larry Johnson
employees.title: Manager
employees.bio: Hi, i am Larry Johnson, currently working as a Marketing manager at Light Rays Limited. I have done my Master in Marketing from the California University of United State. I worked as a marketing supervisior for more than 5 years and now i am here at this company.
